verbs.description: [ARG1: army veteran in us] [ARGM-TMP: since age] 8 [V: deported] [ARGM-TMP: after prison stint] an army veteran from chicago who served two tours in afghanistan and had been in the u s since age 8 has been deported to mexico because of a 2008 drug - trafficking conviction veteran esperanza montes perez tammy duckworth army
